scripts.clear:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf .next && rm -rf cache && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clear: npm run clear:frontend && npm run clear:backend && npm run clear:root
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run develop"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
scripts.app:start:dev: npm run db:up && npm run dev
scripts.app:import:QA: npm run db:up && npm run seed
scripts.app:start:QA_TEST: npm run db:up && npm run app:build:start
